DOC.brief_summary: Background It uncertain whether subtotal abdominal hysterectomy result well bladder , bowel , sexual function total abdominal hysterectomy . Methods The investigator conduct randomized , double-blind trial compare total subtotal abdominal hysterectomy 279 woman refer hysterectomy benign disease ; woman premenopausal . The main outcome measure bladder , bowel , sexual function 12 month . The investigator also evaluate postoperative complication .
